about_the_game:
Play as Guano, a dumb seagull that has a lot on his shoulders! While the protectors of the Pohemeda Islands, the Three Grand Masters, are neutralized, you’re the only hope to rescue your home. Food Inc., an evil and polluting megacorporation, seems to have set its mind on destroying every natural aspect of your archipelago. Get strong enough to stop Food Inc. before their garbage overtakes the islands!

Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to wreak havoc in the Food Inc. installations, by pooping, screaming and stealing the food of tourists attracted by the corp and its leisure-filled resort. Use the stolen food to feed the Grand Masters, restore their strength and acquire their powers through a very sacred ritual: Regurgitation.



Fly at incredible speeds in a stimulating open-world, populated by goofy characters! Friends or enemies? Race against them through breathtaking landmarks to discover new powers!



Save the Pohemeda Islands from Food Inc, a megacorporation polluting the heavenly archipelago. Get help from three powerful Grand Masters to succeed in your quest.



Finally get the chance to drop a dookie on those pesky tourists! Yell at Food Inc. employees until they go flying! Steal their food just like they stole your land!

highlighted.name: I am a big bird now

detailed_description:
Play as Guano, a dumb seagull that has a lot on his shoulders! While the protectors of the Pohemeda Islands, the Three Grand Masters, are neutralized, you’re the only hope to rescue your home. Food Inc., an evil and polluting megacorporation, seems to have set its mind on destroying every natural aspect of your archipelago. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to wreak havoc in the Food Inc. installations, by pooping, screaming and stealing the food of tourists attracted by the corp and its leisure-filled resort. Use the stolen food to feed the Grand Masters, restore their strength and acquire their powers through a very sacred ritual: Regurgitation.



Fly at incredible speeds in a stimulating open-world, populated by goofy characters! Friends or enemies? Race against them through breathtaking landmarks to discover new powers!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel i5 6500 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Processor: Intel i5 9400F or AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Guano

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 version 1909
  • Processor: Intel i5 6500 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 9400F or AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: Play as a delightfully dumb seagull, find food and complete quests to help free the Grand Masters and gain their powers. Harrass humans and free the Pohemeda Islands from the evil Food Inc. with your powerful poop and loud screams!
